      • pointInAngle

        public static boolean pointInAngle​(GeometryAngle geometryAngle,
                                   org.locationtech.jts.geom.Coordinate coordinate)
        Test, if a given coordinate lays inside of the viewing angle given by a GeometryAngle.
        Parameters:
        geometryAngle - the view GeometryAngle the method looks upon searching the given point
        coordinate - the Coordinate, we want to know, whether it lies in the angle
        Returns:
        true, if point lies inside the given angle. false, otherwise
